Content: First sorry for my English. I am from Turkıye /İstanbul and live in İstanbul.I had CBR600f and CBR100rr 10 years ago. I want to buy motorcycle but ı have not much money. My budget 220.000 TL . This budget not enough for new japan or european motorcycle. I can buy old japan motorcycle ( maybe 2005-2006 cbr 600f or yamaha fazer ) or new 2023 model china motorcyle. japan motorcycle generally 50k - 80k km. what is your oppinion or idea. maybe diffrent model . pls tell me . Thanks for all.
